movies.title: Love Is Only a Word
movies.plot: Verena Angenford, the beautiful and sensible wife of a powerful banker falls in love with the 21 year old school-boy Oliver Mansfeld. They start a love affair, believing that Verna's husband doesn't realize what's happening. Verena and Oliver spend a wonderful time together, months full of love and passion, until Paul Angenford forces Verena to stop their affair. But the young couple are willing to fight for their love and resist Angenford's threats...
movies.simplePlot: Verena Angenford, the beautiful and sensible wife of a powerful banker falls in love with the 21 year old school-boy Oliver Mansfeld. They start a love affair, believing that Verna's ...

biography.placeOfBirth: Friedland in Oberschlesien, Upper Silesia, Germany [now Korfantów, Opolskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Judy Winter was born on January 4, 1944 in Friedland in Oberschlesien, Upper Silesia, Germany as Beate Richard. She is an actress, known for Love Is Only a Word (1971), Mutter muss weg (2012) and Woman Doctors (1984).
biography.name: Judy Winter

biography.bio: Herbert Fleischmann was born on March 13, 1925 in Nuremberg, Germany. He was an actor, known for Love Is Only a Word (1971), Iwanow (1971) and Der Fuchs von Övelgönne (1981). He was married to Inge Winkler, Ruth Leuwerik, Xenia Pörtner and Miriam Spoerri. He died on April 5, 1984 in Cavigliano, Ticino, Switzerland.
biography.name: Herbert Fleischmann

biography.bio: Malte Thorsten was born on May 10, 1951 in Wiesbaden, Hesse, Germany as Wolfgang Schumacher. He is an actor, known for Love Is Only a Word (1971), La pluie noire (1972) and Death or Freedom (1977).
biography.name: Malte Thorsten

biography.bio: Donata Höffer was born on September 29, 1949 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress, known for Berliner Antigone (1968), Der kostbare Gast (1979) and Die Katze (1968). She has been married to Peter Franke since 1987. They have one child. She was previously married to Norbert Friedländer.
biography.name: Donata Höffer

biography.bio: Karl Walter Diess was born on January 25, 1928 in Salzburg, Austria. He was an actor, known for Epitaph für einen König (1969), The Officer Factory (1989) and Also gut! Lassen wir uns scheiden! (1967). He was married to Silvia Simon. He died on March 30, 2014 in Frankfurt am Main, Hesse, Germany.
biography.name: Karl Walter Diess

biography.bio: Joey Schoenfelder is an actor, known for Love Is Only a Word (1971), Der Marquis von Keith (1972) and Wer zuletzt lacht, lacht am besten (1971).
biography.name: Joey Schoenfelder

biography.bio: Konrad Georg was born on December 25, 1914 in Mainz, Germany. He was an actor, known for Kommissar Freytag (1963), And Jimmy Went to the Rainbow's Foot (1971) and Mexikanische Revolution (1968). He died on September 8, 1987 in Hamburg, West Germany.
biography.name: Konrad Georg

biography.bio: Friedrich Siemers was born on April 30, 1922 in Leer, Germany. He was an actor, known for Nebeneinander (1964), Sonntags am Meer (1970) and Der Macher oder Warten auf Godeau (1974). He was married to Marion Cito. He died on January 29, 1988 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Friedrich Siemers

biography.bio: Bernd Redecker is an actor, known for Love Is Only a Word (1971), Liebe, so schön wie Liebe (1972) and Unter den Dächern von St. Pauli (1970).
biography.name: Bernd Redecker

biography.bio: Manuel Iregsusi is an actor, known for Love Is Only a Word (1971).
biography.name: Manuel Iregsusi

biography.bio: Friedrich G. Beckhaus was born on December 11, 1927 in Berlin, Germany as Friedrich Georg Beckhaus. He is an actor, known for The Final Solution: The Wannsee Conference (1984), Finke & Co. (1969) and Ein Mann, der nichts gewinnt (1967). He is married to Erika Beckhaus.
biography.name: Friedrich G. Beckhaus

biography.bio: Holger Hagen was born on August 27, 1915 in Halle (Saale), Germany. He is known for his work on Das Fräulein an der Kasse (1964), La famille Trapp en Amérique (1958) and Gesellschaftsspiel (1966). He was married to Bruni Löbel. He died on November 16, 1996 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Holger Hagen

biography.bio: Inge Langen was born on May 21, 1924 in Düsseldorf, Germany. She was an actress, known for Die Truhe (1964), Mord im Pfarrhaus (1970) and Das Land der Verheißung (1960). She died on November 23, 2007 in Switzerland.
biography.name: Inge Langen

biography.bio: Dieter Wagner was born on February 27, 1934 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Friedrich Ebert und Gustav Stresemann, Schicksalsjahre der Republik (1969), Der Fall Wera Sassulitsch (1968) and Die Baronin - Fontane machte sie unsterlich (1981).
biography.name: Dieter Wagner

biography.bio: Ossi Eckmüller was born in 1930. He was an actor, known for Les cinq derniers jours (1982), Jedem die Seine (1992) and Der Komödienstadel: Der verkaufte Großvater (1967). He died on December 31, 1992.
biography.name: Ossi Eckmüller

categories.category: Best Performance by a Young Actor (Beste darstellerische Leistung - Nachwuchsschauspieler)
Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role (Beste darstellerische Leistung - Weibliche Hauptrolle)
